data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Burgas that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Burgas, Bulgaria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 8,120 believers in Burgas, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 50 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the state of Burgas, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Burgas, Bulgaria who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Yoruk people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Yoruk people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Yoruk people is yours.
Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Burgas, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Burgas, Bulgaria to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Burgas, Bulgaria to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received
